title: Comparing the effects of problem- and task-based learning on knowledge and clinical decision-making of nursing students concerning the use of transfusion medicine in pediatric nursing: An educational quasi-experimental study in Iran
content:
Publication date: 30 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 14

Author(s): Soghra Rafie Papkiadeh, Zahra Taheri-Ezbarami, Mahshid Mirzaie Taklimi, Ehsan Kazemnejad Leili, Ali Razaghpoor
